column4: if you are new to linux, i think KDE is the best bet for user friendliness and attractiveness, after enough linux usage many people prefer blackbox or fluxbox however because they are much faster and many people usually use the terminal most
i usually do my linux work in blackbox, however sometimes when i want a full multimedia PC and it is good enough i run KDE
granted, but for ease of use w/ unfamiliar people gnome usually suffices as opposed to metacity or enlightenment
